statements: SELECT * FROM ticket_sales WHERE ticket_type = 'VIP';
SELECT ticket_id, customer_id, fare_amount FROM ticket_sales WHERE customer_id = 12345;
SELECT ticket_type, fare_amount FROM ticket_sales WHERE fare_amount > 100.00;
SELECT ticket_id, transaction_time FROM ticket_sales WHERE transaction_time > '2022-01-01 00:00:00';
SELECT customer_id, ticket_type FROM ticket_sales WHERE ticket_type LIKE 'General Admission%';
SELECT * FROM ticket_sales WHERE ticket_type = 'VIP' ORDER BY fare_amount DESC, transaction_time ASC LIMIT 10
SELECT customer_id, ticket_type, fare_amount FROM ticket_sales WHERE fare_amount > 100 ORDER BY transaction_time DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT ticket_id, fare_amount, transaction_time FROM ticket_sales WHERE customer_id = 123 ORDER BY transaction_time ASC
SELECT DISTINCT customer_id FROM ticket_sales WHERE ticket_type IN ('General', 'VIP') ORDER BY customer_id ASC
SELECT customer_id, ticket_type, fare_amount, DATE_FORMAT(transaction_time,'%Y-%m-%d') AS transaction_date FROM ticket_sales WHERE YEAR(transaction_time) = 2022 ORDER BY fare_amount DESC
SELECT * FROM TicketSales;
SELECT id, ticket_number, customer_name, ticket_price, sale_date FROM TicketSales ORDER BY sale_date DESC;
SELECT customer_name, ticket_price FROM TicketSales WHERE ticket_price > 100;
SELECT id, customer_name FROM TicketSales WHERE sale_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT id, customer_name, ticket_price FROM TicketSales WHERE customer_name LIKE '%Smith%';
SELECT * FROM TicketSales WHERE ticket_price > 100 ORDER BY sale_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT ticket_number, customer_name, ticket_price FROM TicketSales WHERE customer_name LIKE 'John%' ORDER BY ticket_price ASC;
SELECT ticket_number, customer_name, sale_date FROM TicketSales WHERE sale_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31' ORDER BY sale_date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT customer_name, SUM(ticket_price) AS total_sales FROM TicketSales GROUP BY customer_name HAVING total_sales > 500 ORDER BY total_sales DESC;

SELECT t.customer_name, t.ticket_price, p.amount_paid FROM TicketSales t LEFT JOIN FarePayments p ON t.customer_name = p.customer_name WHERE t.ticket_price < p.amount_paid ORDER BY t.ticket_price DESC,p.amount_paid ASC;
SELECT * FROM tickets;
SELECT ticket_id, ticket_type FROM tickets WHERE ticket_price > 50;
SELECT ticket_id, ticket_price, ticket_type FROM tickets ORDER BY ticket_price DESC;
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE payment_method = 'Credit Card';
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, customer_email FROM customers WHERE customer_name LIKE '%John%';
SELECT * FROM tickets WHERE ticket_price > 100 ORDER BY ticket_id DESC;
SELECT ticket_id, ticket_type FROM tickets WHERE ticket_type LIKE 'VIP%' ORDER BY ticket_type ASC;

SELECT t.ticket_id, t.ticket_price, c.customer_name FROM tickets t INNER JOIN transactions tr ON t.ticket_id = tr.ticket_id INNER JOIN customers c ON tr.customer_id = c.customer_id WHERE c.customer_name = 'John Doe';
SELECT SUM(ticket_price) AS total_revenue FROM tickets;

SELECT c.customer_name, COUNT(t.ticket_id) AS total_tickets FROM customers c LEFT JOIN transactions tr ON c.customer_id = tr.customer_id LEFT JOIN tickets t ON tr.ticket_id = t.ticket_id GROUP BY c.customer_name ORDER BY total_tickets DESC, c.customer_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM tickets;
SELECT ticket_id, event_name, price FROM tickets WHERE price > 50;
SELECT customer_name, phone_number FROM customers ORDER BY customer_name DESC;
SELECT transaction_id, total_amount, DATE(transaction_date) AS date FROM transactions WHERE total_amount < 100 ORDER BY date ASC;
SELECT p.customer_id, p.payment_type, c.customer_name FROM payment_methods p INNER JOIN customers c ON p.customer_id = c.customer_id;
SELECT * FROM tickets WHERE price > 100 ORDER BY price DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT event_name, price, purchase_date FROM tickets WHERE purchase_date >= '2021-01-01' ORDER BY purchase_date ASC LIMIT 5;

SELECT t.event_name, t.price, c.customer_name FROM tickets t INNER JOIN transactions tr ON t.ticket_id = tr.ticket_id INNER JOIN customers c ON tr.customer_id = c.customer_id ORDER BY t.event_name, c.customer_name LIMIT 5;
SELECT ticket_id, ticket_type, event_name, price, purchase_date FROM tickets WHERE event_name LIKE '%Concert%' ORDER BY purchase_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT c.customer_name, c.email, p.payment_type, p.card_number FROM customers c LEFT JOIN payment_methods p ON c.customer_id = p.customer_id ORDER BY c.customer_name ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM tickets ORDER BY event_name ASC;
SELECT event_name, ticket_price FROM tickets WHERE purchase_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY ticket_price DESC;
SELECT customer_name, email, phone_number FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1001;
SELECT event_name, event_date, event_location FROM events WHERE event_date BETWEEN '2022-06-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT ticket_id, purchase_date FROM tickets WHERE ticket_price < 50.00 ORDER BY purchase_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM events WHERE event_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT customer_name, email, phone_number FROM customers WHERE phone_number LIKE '%123%';
SELECT event_name, event_location FROM events ORDER BY event_date DESC;
SELECT COUNT(*) as total_tickets_sold, SUM(amount_paid) as total_revenue FROM transactions;

SELECT customer_name, event_name, purchase_date FROM customers c JOIN transactions t ON c.customer_id = t.customer_id JOIN tickets ti ON t.ticket_id = ti.ticket_id WHERE ti.ticket_price > 50 ORDER BY purchase_date ASC;
